title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.body: Hi, it is giving me no joy to tell you that **Narada will not be able to check allotments for the IPO of Bajaj Housing Finance Limited** due to some technical challenges. We're sorry.
data.markdown_body: Hi, it is giving me no joy to tell you that **Narada will not be able to check allotments for the IPO of Bajaj Housing Finance Limited** due to some technical challenges. We're sorry.
